system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal.

Effect: Upon resolving this attack, the user freely uses Grassy Terrain.

Requirement: [Grass] Z-Crystal as an Accessory Item and a Grass-Type attack on the user's Active List.
